channel.title: Travis Ci on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Travis Ci on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Snap CI
item.description: Snap CI is a cloud-based continuous integration system. Like Travis CI, which I have written about here, it lives in the cloud, lets you run programs triggered by GitHub commits, and offers a testing environment for free for open source projects which lets you familiarize yourself with the system before deciding to pay for it for your non-open-source efforts. I’m looking at all of these tools now because this weblog is now managed through a process that involves checking things into Github, which makes it completely suitable for automation for common tasks every time I save a file.
